name: CRED's neoPOP  UI kit (unofficial)
description:
neoPOP is a design language introduced by CRED and this file is a fork of their new design system.


this file contains a color system, typography, grid, and a robust 300+ component, variants all with component props.


Suggestion and/or feedback are welcome. Feel free to contact


v1.1 Update

  • added KOTAK BANK credit card
  • fixed some bugs in the button
  • fixed some glitches in the credit card components & variants
